nodes.bodyText: Do the incorrect indentations here mean this pipeline wasn't properly triggering?

nodes.bodyText: I assume you didn't switch these to extends because they didn't require any repo references? We definitely should consider converting them all to extends for consistency. @mitchdenny what are your thoughts here?
